Sentencas: In solid oxide cell operation, the stoichiometry of the air electrode is an important factor for its interaction with electrolyte and interconnect and long-term cell performance.
Titulo: Surface and interface behaviors of (La0.8Sr0.2)xMnO3 air electrode for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: In this study, tri-layer samples of yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ)/(La0.8Sr0.2)(x)MnO3 (LSM)/AISI 441 stainless steel are made and thermally treated in dry air atmosphere at 800 C for 500 h. The air electrode composition is varied by changing the x value in (La0.8Sr0.2)(x)MnO3 from 0.95 to 1.05 (L5M95, LSM100, and LSM105).
Titulo: Surface and interface behaviors of (La0.8Sr0.2)xMnO3 air electrode for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The LSM composition segregation, YSZ/LSM/AISI 441 interfacial interaction, and the reaction of volatile chromium species with the LSM surface are characterized by scanning electron microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: Surface and interface behaviors of (La0.8Sr0.2)xMnO3 air electrode for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS), and X-ray diffraction (XRD).
Titulo: Surface and interface behaviors of (La0.8Sr0.2)xMnO3 air electrode for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Surface segregation of Sr and La are detected for all the LSM samples.
Titulo: Surface and interface behaviors of (La0.8Sr0.2)xMnO3 air electrode for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Cr deposition is found across the LSM surface.
Titulo: Surface and interface behaviors of (La0.8Sr0.2)xMnO3 air electrode for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: For the LSM95 sample, Sr-containing compound leads to a high Cr content at the YSZ/LSM interface.
Titulo: Surface and interface behaviors of (La0.8Sr0.2)xMnO3 air electrode for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: For the LSM105 sample, on the other hand, the enrichment of La at the YSZ/LSM interface hinders the Cr deposition, leading to a very low Cr content.
Titulo: Surface and interface behaviors of (La0.8Sr0.2)xMnO3 air electrode for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The mechanisms of LSM elemental surface segregation and Cr deposition are discussed.
Titulo: Surface and interface behaviors of (La0.8Sr0.2)xMnO3 air electrode for solid oxide cells
Surface and interface behaviors of (La0.8Sr0.2)xMnO3 air electrode for solid oxide cells
Surface and interface behaviors of (La0.8Sr0.2)xMnO3 air electrode for solid oxide cells
